## More

* Low power, basic module can last up to 10 years^[depends on sensor power needs and sampling rate] on a non rechargable battery and forever with a rechargable battery and a solar pannel.
* Versatile sensors
* Low cost
* Flexible cloud managment and data routing
* Two-way comunication: Trumpet {{< fa arrow-right-arrow-left >}} Cloud
* Works worldwide, 10-year cell service included^[provided by Blues Wireless]
